title: A Phoenix Dragon Novel 01: Renascent
features: The Phoenix Dragon Collection, a New Urban Fantasy series from
USA Today bestselling author, Paris Andren.
Only through death would her destiny be realized.

Cursed with the ability to hear and feel the pains of lost and tortured souls, Charani is committed to an asylum to cure her of the insanity. After years of heinous therapies, she finally loses the will to live and embraces death. In that moment she is reborn into something ancient and powerful.Drawn in to a centuries-old war between dragons and drampires, Charani realizes her curse may actually be the

needed to find the voices of the lost and the Amulet of the Dead, but only if she can learn to harness her ability. If she fails, the cost will be her life and that of her dragon brethren.Digital version contained within the MAGIC AFTER DARK Box Set.
description: Paris Andren is a USA Today bestselling author.She writes emotionally evocative stories that touch on real and often intense storylines, suspenseful mysteries and thrillers that come with unexpected humor and romance--and now she has started in a new genre--Urban Fantasy.She lives in the US with her husband of 28 years and her 10 year old Shih Tzu, Meme.
